content.description: This route climbs up the left side of the front (w) face of The Lion.
content.protection: There are 3 bolts on this climb;  maybe a piece or two need at the bottom.
content.location: The Lion is located at the top of the hill, just above the gated mine shafts, and before The Towers. It is just before the intersection of the North Trail that leads left to Silverado/Fraggle Rock, and the Queen Crimson Trail which leads to the right.

content.description: This challenging  climb ascends the right side of this formation, climbing up a steep face on two very thin white dikes.  Originally rated 5.10+, this climb has since been upgraded to solid 5.11.
content.protection: Three bolts, and maybe a piece needed near the top.
content.location: Located at the top of the trail, above the gated mine shafts, and just before the intersection of the N. Trail (which leads left of Fraggle and Silverado), and the queen Crimson trail, (which leads off to the right.)
